name: Zombie Evolution World
description:
What should you feed to manifest your outstanding taste?
Human? Employees? Or the whole family?
No~ it is a tasteful option to feed zombies.
Feeding a zombie is an extraordinary breeding process.
No confidence in life? Feed a zombie.
Bad academic performance? Feed a zombie.
Less family expenses from your husband? Feed a zombie.
Feeding a zombie is the right answer.

- 50 very unique zombies waiting for your discovery!
- Each evolution route has its own storyline
- Your feedling choice determines the evolution route!
- Feed according to the feeding hint to discover more zombies
- Bring your zombie to have a casual fight with other zombies

Download for free now~
